experience.title: Quality Analyst
description: Examining data annotations (text, images, audio) for accuracy and adherence to project guidelines.
Applying quality standards to identify errors and inconsistencies.
Providing feedback to contributors and tracking performance metrics.
Reporting quality concerns to project managers to improve data quality.

experience.title: Premium App Support
description: Diagnosed and resolved complex technical issues related to system architecture and integrations.
Performed system health checks to prevent issues before they impacted customers.
Designed and implemented custom solutions based on client needs.
Maintained communication with key stakeholders and provided technical training.

experience.title: Apple Support Advisor
description: Provided technical support via calls, emails, and live chat.
Diagnosed and resolved internet connectivity and network configuration issues.
Assisted customers with billing, service upgrades, and password resets.

experience.title: Technical Support Specialist
description: Troubleshot internet connectivity, modem setup, and network speed issues.
Escalated complex issues to senior engineers.
Stayed updated with evolving networking technologies.
